website_summaries.verdict: Takes some time to break in but this is a quality helmet that will keep your head safe.
pros: Meets DOT and ECE safety standards
A very sturdy and well-built helmet for the price
cons: Better as a summer helmet since the vents are open to cold air

customer_reviews.title: Great summer helmet
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet, one complaint I have is the straps grab too close to my neck instead of under my jaw. Great for summer moves alot of air even though there's no forehead vent it's not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: j-rodd911

customer_reviews.title: Another Solid Biltwell Product
customer_reviews.text: Solid helmet that the ladies love! Nice finish on the outside, comfortable liner inside, and the visor doesn’t fog easily, and is optically correct. Another solid product from biltwell. If I had to nitpick, I only have two changes I’d like to see. Move the chin strap forward a bit so it is more under my chin and less against my neck. Secondly, make the mouth vent closeable for the cold mornings, and maybe add some brow vents that are also closeable for the warmer days. Overall it is a solid design, and feels great. Don’t be tempted with the Chinese knock-offs, trust me, you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ScranScran

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy the Lane Splitter
customer_reviews.text: Not for me, fit well, but very cheaply made. I was not expecting Shoei quality for $250... but i was expecting a good seal... a visor that stays up. Everyone said it was tight mine was loose as hell on both the Large and the Medium. Would not buy again. I landed on the LS2 Breaker, and am much happier and 100 bucks richer.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. AZ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, features are pretty meh
customer_reviews.text: Helmet looks great and fits well, gets the job done. Things I don't like for the $250 price is the front vent isn't adjustable so cold weather riding is tough unless you stuff a rag inside. Also the visor does not stay in the up position very well, slightest motion makes it fall down. Since the "anti fog" visor fogs when sitting still at around 55 degrees, I lift it at stop lights but usually keeps falling.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan R

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is just perfect! It’s light weight, provides a TON of ventilation and is about as stylish as it gets. The large visor is clear and provides very good vision to your peripherals. You get the look and safety of a Simpson helmet- at half the cost. I absolutely recommend this helmet for anyone who is in the market for one. Additionally, if you ride in cold weather, you will need to ride with a neck gator up over your nose and mouth to prevent your face from getting too cold.
customer_reviews.author: Pontizzle

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with the helmet
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with the helmet. I have what I'd consider a pretty average size head (7 1/4-3/8 hat size) and a "large" helmet fits me nice and snug. I could probably even wear an XL but I wouldn't want any movement in the helmet down the road when the pads break in more. All the materials used seem very high quality, and the finish is top notch. Let's hope I never find out how safe it is...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Seely

customer_reviews.title: Great ventilation, comfortable, stylish
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Biltwell products. Everything from gloves to helmets to shirts are top notch, albeit a little pricey for what they are. This helmet however, I feel is a great value. Lots of colors to fit every rider, numerous cheek pad sizes, fully removable internal padding. The ventilation is great! I don't feel like i'm missing out on the wind in my face moving to this helmet from my halfie. I installed a Cardo packtalk 4+, which was super easy, and it has improved all of my rides. I lean towards a 7 5/8 hat, and the XL fits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: michael d.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible visor and visor design
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the helmet looks and it is comfortable but here's the bad.... The visor barely stays in the open position and the pin and hole visor design needs work as it's not a smooth open and close. Now to the worst...i had the helmet for a week and the thin antifog layer on the inside began to peel up. It seems like where the visor meets the seal at the bottom is where it began to rub the film. I contacted Biltwell and they said the visor is under warranty so they are sending me a new visor.
customer_reviews.author: PapaSchauer

customer_reviews.title: Light and tight
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up because I switched over to cruzers from sport bikes, and I still wanted a full face helmet that looked right on a bobber style bike. My criteria were; light weight, snug fit, streamline shell (not overly thick), and full face. This nailed it, and it looks awesome! It feels like a feather compared to my old Shoei and Scorpion, and there is plenty of airflow. What surprised me the most was the massive vizability improvement do to the goggle cut and the face being a little closer.
customer_reviews.author: Nikonator

customer_reviews.title: helmet is great but size IS NOT true to fit
customer_reviews.text: I loved the helmet itself the only problem I had with it is the sizes are not true to fit I bought this for my husband for a Christmas present and he normally wears a xl but when I gave it to him to try on he couldn't get it down on his face so I have to refund it and order a 2xl so I would suggest to anyone looking to buy order 1 size bigger than what you normally wear
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Strunk

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I always liked the look of the old Simpsons so when I was looking for a new helmet this lane splitter caught my eye. It has a removable wind/dust deflector I removed for summer in town riding to make it cooler. It has much better vision to the side than my last street helmet, vision down is some what less because of the snout. don't think that is a problem though. Overall it fits well, is easy to put on and remove.
customer_reviews.author: T2jk

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this helmet in 2019 because I couldn't bring myself to spend 400$+ on a helmet and so far have gotten 10,000 miles out of it. Not too noisy. Definitely stylish, I paired it with a tinted shield and love it. Has pockets for headset,easy to install! Definitely a great helmet for the price. I plan to keep it in my rotation. Only downside is it is not the best for winter/spring as it has good airflow..wish it had vents yoh could close! Shield doesn't like to stay open on its own anymore so that is also a negative. Still overall an awesome helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shop around.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon for $265. Then a week later I saw this same helmet for $137. The cheek pads may seem way too big for your face. Don't send it right back but call Biltwell and they will send you new thinner cheek pads. Then this helmet will fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Aleph the Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Horrible wind noise. Cannot hear Sena
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the helmet besides one thing..... Wind noise. Outside noise is so loud, I cannot hear my Sena at all. I've blocked the vents and it's better, but I cannot make a phone call, talk on the radio, nothing with this helmet. Unfortunately I modified it to try to improve it, it's non refundable. If you use a Sena, it's built well for one to install, but I think they forgot you need to hear out of it too.
customer_reviews.author: m.wehrwein

customer_reviews.title: Overall nicely designed
customer_reviews.text: Love the helmet however shield doesnt want to stay open in small incriments and sometimes stays open only in the fully open position but still nice overall have used it this winter but can imagine the ventilation should be really nice in the summer i wish it had a cut off one the vent for when its really cold out
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet! Some of my buddies were rocking these and I tried it out. Good quality helmet, visor snaps on nicely closed, vents flow air through out the helmet, padding is nice and can be washed if need be. I was gonna go with the flat black but so glad I got the glossy black. For the price, this Biltwell Lane Splitter helmet just can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Mirren

customer_reviews.title: No vent control
customer_reviews.text: The helmet looks good, fits good, but the vents in the front have no option of closing them, so you get constant air. It's usually not bad, but if it's a little chilly or even raining you'll really want to close them. I would still buy the helmet again, but if you do winter riding you may want to reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxon

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet!!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is by far the best I've ever purchased. Very comfortable and very lite! Lots of air flow and probably one of the best looking helmets on the market! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Runs snug, noisey at speed.  Otherwise awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for cruising. If you ride a crotch rocket then it will get wind noisy at 80+mph. Fit very snug on me but just fine after I bought the slimmest cheek pad replacements from the Biltwell website. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Generic Dude

customer_reviews.title: Used helmets!
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this helmet, paid for a brand new XL. Once I received the helmet I got a XXL very used helmet. It was disappointing, disgusting, unsanitary and just not right especially with the Covid 19 going on. The tags were wore out. Looked dirty and even found hair in the helmet!! Please do not advertise brand new prices and helmets when they are actually used.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: First, the helmet looks amazing! I get compliments regularly. It is Very comfortable. It can be noisy, but let’s be honest no one is wanting this helmet for a quiet ride. The customer service is absolutely amazing! My chinstrap frayed and the button fell out. I messaged Biltwell for a replacement strap, but they insisted that I send it to them so I did free of charge. A week late I got a helmet in. I noticed it was too nice to be mine so I sent an email thanking them for cleaning it up...it was a brand new helmet. No questions asked and they just replaced it with a new helmet. Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Howell

customer_reviews.title: Visor is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Helmet itself is good but the visor is very low quality. It started to bubble/ peal with in a month was really small but had got to the size of a silver dollar or bigger and it rattles allot at speeds over 45.
customer_reviews.author: arthur valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Best helmet I ever bought. I looks pretty cool on the harley davidson and is crazy comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: aron sprague

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet ever have
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is sexy , great looking , very good quality amazing fit very light weight, this helmet is a 5 start item no doubt, for the money is better quality than alot helmet twice the price, I love it
customer_reviews.author: edwin paredes

customer_reviews.title: A Super comfy yet badass brain bucket!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the most comfortable full face helmet i’ve Ever owned, and i’ve Had several. Would buy it again, and I reccommend getting one of you’re on the fence about it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need to adjust but still 5 star!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Look and feel, great quality. It’s simple nothing flashy and I love that about it I did need to get new cheek pads unless you really like a TIGHT fit...they sell them on amazon and bitwell website, easy adjustment. I gave five stars even though unneeded to adjust because it is still 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but can barely see through the visor
customer_reviews.text: My visor is defective. Some kind of awkward clouding all across the visor. Would've expected better for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hulkst3r

customer_reviews.title: Made very well, but was smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a XL in helmets, but this particular brand was tight around the sides of my face. They didn't have a 2xl in flat black, so I had to go elsewhere to find larger size. It appeared to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Helmet with some issues
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits tight in the cheeks but comfortable overall. The face shield started to peel after only a month of use. This is unacceptable for quality expected from Biltwell. Solid helmet overall but the face shield needs to be addressed at the company.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, made well, but was smaller than described and they don’t make a bigger size. Unfortunately had to return.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Super Bada**, Comfortable and Light
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! Super light comfotable super wide FOV. Also fits true to size! I normally wear a medium and bought a medium! Totally bada** look! Only reason why its a 4/5 is because its a bit louder than my AGV K5S so its a bit to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: It's Ya Boi

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, shield is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Reason for the four instead of five stars is that the visor does fog up but not with condensation rather a coarse type chemicals residue it seems. Other wise great helmet and awesome ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Hippie

customer_reviews.title: really cool helmet
customer_reviews.text: this is a comfortable helmet i love it even in the heat we have here in southern nc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a really nice helmet!
customer_reviews.text: For the price I have zero gripes! Is it a little noisy, sure. Could it be better if it had top/forehead/brow venting, sure. This helmet vents GREAT open or closed behind my 12” Road Glide fairing. And the noise was honestly only noticeable after an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Killer helmet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this helmet. It's light, has great visibility out of the eye port and just plain looks cool. The inside is perfect for me. cheek pads and lining feel plush but firm. The ventilation is great, no problems with fogging early am or at night. Biltwell killed it with this helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little bit big
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a present for my grandson. He is sorry he didn't get a small because it is a little to loose.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet good price.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Tight at cheek, but comfy. Great helmet good price.
customer_reviews.author: Revalator

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall appearance
customer_reviews.text: Nice overall appearance. Inner material is of good quality,comfortable. Only issue I had when it was new the padding against your cheeks is a little firm. After its broke in it fits like glove.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet!! Perfect fit, works in well and with easily interchangeable visors it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lunchbox88

customer_reviews.title: Gloss black loves the finger prints.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all aside from the windscreen not having set height notches. I love the look and feel
customer_reviews.author: Andre baldovinos

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Fits my oval shape head perfectly. Size is true to fit. Great air flow from vents.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is the first helmet that fit me well, but it really feels like a bicycle helmet. It’s basically low quality plastic. Don’t feel totally safe relying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Soule

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good except the shield. The anti fog was crusted up on the inside. I ordered a gold mirror shield to replace the clear defected one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: The box came damaged with holes. Helmet not worth even 10$. Uncomfortable. I bought a M which I use in every helmet and this one was super tight couldn’t even fit. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is phenomenal helmet. I wear a medium in a Shoei and that’s what I bought. Fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Loud and high air intake
customer_reviews.text: Lets in too much air, no air intake control, very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk T. Draheim

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits so good!
customer_reviews.text: MotoMummy delivered my helmet very quickly and it even came with a Biltwell helmet bag. The helmet was in perfect condition. The color and fit was amazing! I was right in between a Small or Medium & went with a small- its snug around my cheeks/jaw (as it should be) and sits really comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Annabella Polizzi

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great and air flow keeps me nice and cool
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great and air flow keeps me nice and cool. They seem to run a little big my other helmets are size large but this medium fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Are looks really everything?
customer_reviews.text: It's loud, and the visor doesn't stay up if you go over 65 mph, but you look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and stays put at high speeds. Vents work good
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Little tight on my cheeks but I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Like the fit after it broke in and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very simple helmet. A little spendy but competitive with the market price. Like the fit after it broke in and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brennon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, very fast shipping. This is the best helmet in its price range
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No box??
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to form, looks great, but didn’t come in original biltwel box? Was just in a shipping box with a thin foam padding around it
customer_reviews.author: mitch blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a Simpson Ghost Bandit
customer_reviews.text: Got here quick, fit great! Now I have less of a chance of dying! Looks pretty sinister on my dyna (also flat [denim] black). Biltwell is pretty great bang for buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed to have order the helmet and literally got two sizes too small, I ordered an XL and got a M
customer_reviews.author: BrandonS

customer_reviews.title: I know my boyfriend will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Box was a little beat up but came fast, I know my boyfriend will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Kenney

customer_reviews.title: so satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: So badass. Looked a long time for a helmet and this is it. 5 stars, so satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Awsome. Could be antifog
customer_reviews.text: Great and awsome in most ways. Could come with an antifog screen. Had to buy a product for that
customer_reviews.author: hector rueda

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size down when ordering. The helmet received was loose once it was put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Biltwell Unisex-Adult Full face Lane Splitter Helmet (Flat Black, Large)
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:Flat BlackThe Lane Splitter is crafted around Biltwell's proprietary ABS outer shell and features a shock-absorbing EPS liner with hand-stitched interior padding, cheek pads and Bio Foam chin bar cushion for comfort. Generous vents in the chin bar get the air flowing and the outlet in back lets hot air escape. The Lane Splitter shield boasts extremely accurate optics and simple hinge mechanics for high style and easy removal for replacement or cleaning. A brass peg and hole configuration on the left side of the shield offers speedy opening and secure closing with little fanfare or complication. Mesh pockets are included in the ear recess-perfect for aftermarket drop in communication systems. Injection-molded ABS outer shell with hand-painted finish. Expanded polystyrene inner shell. Hand-sewn removable brushed Lycra liner w/contrasting diamond-stitched quilted open-cell foam padding. Audio pockets in ear recesses. Injection molded anti-scratch polycarbonate eye port shield with the aluminum hinge covers and mounting hardware. Meets DOT & ECE safety standards.
feature_bullets: Injection-molded ABS outer shell with hand-painted finish
Hand-sewn removable brushed Lycra liner w/contrasting diamond-stitched quilted open-cell foam padding
Injection molded anti-scratch polycarbonate eye port shield with the aluminum hinge covers and mounting hardware
Audio pockets in ear recesses Meets DOT & ECE safety standards

specifications.Vehicle Service Type: Street-touring-motorcycles, Street-sport-motorcycles, Off-road-motorcycles, Street-cruiser-motorcycles, Utility-vehicles, All-terrain-vehicles, Street-motor-scooters
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars173 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
